tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: We were extremely happy to meet doctor. Visited for treatment of hair fall. She explained the problem very well and gave logical recommendation. Gave us enough time to answer our doubts. Would definitely recommend her to all. After discussing with her we were confident about going for PRP treatment.

I have acne problem .. visited a doctor earlier and not happy with the diagnosis. I came across Deepika mam through my friend.. it's been 3 years since I visited and I am happy with each and every visit **** *** *** ** ******* ** ***** ***** **** I would definitely recommend this to everyone. And I have recommended her to my close relatives and friends.

I took my daughter  to show warts/corn on her feet. She examined and explained that it is warts. Did plain paring to my daugherts feet and asked us to visit after two weeks. Over all I am happy with her treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The procedure was swift and minimal wait time. Doctor explained everything in easy to understand manner.
The experience with doctor was good.but the pharmacy people have extra medicines and have taken extra Money.
One of her great qualities is she can empatize, she listens and cares. Also tries to explain the treatment approach in a way that you can understand .
My son is still under treatment. Cannot say much now. He has just started using the medicines. Probably after one week we can see some improvement.

I truly recommend this doctor.
Professional, friendly straight to the point.
The way she explains about the issue and good suggestion everything is so good.
I am happy to have a consultation with Dr.Vijaya Deepika. She listened to my problem with much patience by which I can  explain my problem so clearly and I feel much friendliness to share my problem.
reply_text: Greetings from Dermiq . thank u so much for ur feed back ... we are happy to serve u

We wish u to start the medication as u had severe hair fall.... thank u

review: I came few minutes late for my appointment but I didn't have to wait too long to get my turn. Doctor listened to my problem and then looked at the rash. She knew immediately what it is and prescribed the necessary treatment that kicked in 3 days after I started it and I can see the infection slowly but surely going away. In fact I waited till I saw it worked, before sharing this feedback :) I am happy!
Very nice & she had good communication to explain our problems clearly, I recommend her.
